Changed from abstract to non-abstract.

Removed Methods
void accumulateStats(JobControl) Updates the statistics after a patch of jobs is done
JobStats addJobStats(Job) Add stats for a new Job which doesn't yet need to be completed.

void stopCollection(boolean) Stops collecting statistics for a MR plan
void updateJobMroMap(Map) Updates the JobGraph of the PigStats The initial JobGraph is created without job ids using MROperPlan before any job is submitted for execution.
